title: Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Course Through Simulator-Based Programming Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic programming concepts and experience in writing simple code
context.additional_context: A course focused on business automation and data processing simulations for learners in managerial/leadership roles.

learning_goals: Learners can solve over 80% of programming problems simulating real-world work environments using simulator tools
Learners can independently diagnose and correct logical errors occurring in the programming process three times consecutively.
Learners can collaborate in a simulated scenario-based team project and present completed code at least once.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
